Column {data-width=200}
-------------------------------------
   
### Chart 1

```{r test1, echo=FALSE}
library(dygraphs)
liquidity = read.csv("Inflasi_yoy.csv")
myts2 <- ts(liquidity, start=c(2010, 1), end=c(2019, 2), frequency=12)
dygraph(myts2, main = "Inflation (YoY)") %>%
dySeries(c("lwr", "fit", "upr"), label = "Inflation YoY") %>%
dyRangeSelector()
```
